      • center

        protected java.util.List<Vector> center​(int from,
                                        int to)
        Creates a new cluster center based on the endpoints of the interval [from, to).

      • circular

        public static <P extends Points> ClusteringStrategy<P> circular​(int bins,
                                                                int clusters)
        Modified Otsu's method for circular data like hues. It considers all of the rotations of the histogram as well.
        Parameters:
        bins - the size of the histogram
        clusters - the number of clusters to generate

        public static <P extends Points> ClusteringStrategy<P> linear​(int bins,
                                                              int clusters)
        The original Otsu's method.
        Parameters:
        bins - the size of the histogram
        clusters - the number of clusters to generate

      • otsu

        protected void otsu​(Continuation<Clusters> continuation)
             throws java.lang.Throwable

      • threshold

        protected void threshold​(dog.giraffe.cluster.Otsu.Histogram histogram,
                         Continuation<dog.giraffe.cluster.Otsu.Thresholds> continuation)
                  throws java.lang.Throwable
        Selects the best threshold. Forks on all of the possible first threshold.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Throwable

      • threshold

        protected dog.giraffe.cluster.Otsu.Thresholds threshold​(dog.giraffe.cluster.Otsu.Histogram histogram,
                                                        dog.giraffe.cluster.Otsu.Thresholds best,
                                                        double error,
                                                        int[] thresholds,
                                                        int selectedThresholds)
                                                 throws java.lang.Throwable
        Recursive method to select thresholds.
        Parameters:
        best - the the best threshold so far
        error - the cumulative inner-class variance os the selected clusters
        thresholds - the indices of selected thresholds
        selectedThresholds - the number of selected thresholds
        Throws:
        java.lang.Throwable
